product_name: Pearl Izumi X-Alp Seek V Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: The Pearl Izumi X-Alp Seek V bike shoes boast a running shoe style upper and a carbon rubber lugged bottom for both cycling and off the bike adventures. Quick-drying, breathable mesh and synthetic leather uppers offer protection and durability. Shoe features an improved shank for increased pedaling performance and response without hindering the off-bike feel. Dual-density EVA outsoles/midsoles have denser EVA placed between pedal and foot to absorb shock, return energy and provide cushioning on and off your bike. Outsole is a combination of EVA and rugged carbon rubber with deep lugs that supply superior traction; beveled heels enhance stepping motion. Traditional lace closure and low-cut construction fit like your comfortable tennis shoes. Additional support in heel pad for cushioning off the bike. Cleats for Pearl Izumi X-Alp Seek V bike shoes are sold separately.
short_description: The Pearl Izumi X-Alp Seek V bike shoes boast a running shoe style upper and a carbon rubber lugged bottom for both cycling and off the bike adventures.
